body:
Grassen?
Num tienes graça.
No grace just total disgrace so much rape.
Where are their saviors?
Wheres the escape?
Heck if its made by Japs wheres the suicide by jumping of a cliff or high tower?
This series of doujins should be renamed:
Grabbem War.
A Rapertory.
That would be more suitable and would prevent nonrape lovers such as me from bumping into this debase.
there's no rape at all in this title wtf?
ah, yes... times when i like vanilla... good old times....
Warning: this guy likes lots of rape and torture, so don't read anything by him if you like vanilla.
